backend/main.mo: Actor canister handling authorization, user profiles, product CRUD, and Stripe checkout session integration with outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing admin-login issues, affected frontend files, and related components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including routing, admin guards, product pages, and utility modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global UI variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for storefront, cart, payment, and admin pages wrapped in ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing alerts when access is denied.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button that manages authentication state and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first-time users to submit their name and saving the profile through backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Main layout with navigation, admin link visibility based on auth and admin status, and automatic profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays product info with image, price, and add-to-cart button, supporting detail view navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as products, user profiles, roles, and Stripe sessions.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides small utility functions including class name merging and currency formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin landing page with navigation cards for managing products and payment settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting products using dialogs and API mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminStripeSetu: Page for configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries with form validation.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, manages item quantities, and initiates a Stripe checkout session.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment cancellation message with navigation options back to cart or store.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows successful payment confirmation, clears the cart on completion, and displays order details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows product details, allows quantity selection, and adds items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Displays products with loading skeletons and allows adding to cart or viewing details.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with add, remove, update, totals, and persistence.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, existing features for storefront, backend APIs, Stripe integration, and admin management, plus pending feature requests and architectural notes. Captures current versioning and configuration details for planning.
